```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


`rcces` is includes functions that could be useful in reading in and analyzing data from the [CCES](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/II2DB6). Currently it is just a bundle of personal functions, not designed for distribution.


## Installation

You can install the package using devtools. 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("kuriwaki/rcces")
```
